variants.Description in input context: This variant affects the protein structure and function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line expressing wild-type and mutant TPY5D proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant TPY5D protein showed significantly reduced expression levels compared to the wild-type protein.

Biological replicates.Description: Four biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TPY5D cDNA transfected into HEK293T cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Mock-transfected HEK293T cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels of TPY5D protein greater than 80% of the wild-type level.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels of TPY5D protein less than 20% of the wild-type level.
